sentences.en: Regions such as southern Florida and the Southwest have numerous Spanish-speaking neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达州南部以及美国西南部等区，有许多说西班牙语的社区。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, foreign companies are turning to Brazil not just for the size of its booming domestic market, but also as a platform to its Spanish-speaking neighbours.
sentences.cn: 同时，外国公司也把眼光投向了巴西，不单是觊觎其繁荣庞大的国内市场，也将其看作是能联系其说西班牙语邻国的平台。
